FemaleHalfling01.synopsis: Three halfling stand near a cart that was once full to the brim with fresh food and supplies. Other refugees swarmed it in a panic and stuffed their pockets - breaking the cart in the process. The halflings got there too later, and now stand next to the wreckage of the cart.
FemaleHalfling01.how_to_trigger: - Go to 85; 64; -55- Talk to the female halfling.

FemaleHalfling01_0.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
FemaleHalfling01_0.text: We got here first, friend. You're welcome to whatever scraps we leave behind.
FemaleHalfling01_0.context: NodeContext: Sharp tone, thinks the player might be trying to muscle in on the supplies they found.

FemaleHalfling01_1.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
FemaleHalfling01_1.text: You can root through the cart when we're done.
FemaleHalfling01_1.context: NodeContext: Sharp tone, thinks the player might be trying to muscle in on the supplies they found.

FemaleHalfling02_0.speaker: Tina Two-Thumbs
FemaleHalfling02_0.context: NodeContext: A little panicked, almost childish - thinks the player is going to try and rob her spoils off her

FemaleHalfling02_1.speaker: Tina Two-Thumbs
FemaleHalfling02_1.text: Back off - I found these apples first!
FemaleHalfling02_1.context: NodeContext: A little panicked, almost childish - thinks the player is going to try and rob her spoils off her

MaleHalfling_0.speaker: Slarmy
MaleHalfling_0.text: Look. The other refugees clean broke the cart while looting it - damned thing is useless now.
MaleHalfling_0.context: NodeContext: annoyed, disgruntled. 'Look' gestures to his left.

MaleHalfling_1.speaker: Slarmy
MaleHalfling_1.text: If you're here to fill an empty stomach, look elsewhere. Folks swarmed what little was had, stuffing their pockets. Bloody animals.
MaleHalfling_1.context: NodeContext: annoyed, disgruntled. Gestures to his left (where the cart is)

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_2.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_2.text: Take the wood from the cart too - that'll be good for a fire, if nothing else.

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_5.speaker: Slarmy
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_5.text: Bloody savages, the lot of them!

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_7.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_7.text: We're as desperate as the rest of these 'savages'. They just had the sense to move quicker than us.

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_6.speaker: Slarmy
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_6.text: Look at that - finest pie that fruit could have made. Now it's mush.

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_1.speaker: Tina Two-Thumbs
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_1.text: You remember that spiced apple loaf we had in Waterdeep? The big one?

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_0.speaker: Slarmy
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_0.text: Gods, I can practically smell it.

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_4.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_4.text: Shut it. Scavenge whatever you can from this mess - we'll make something out of it.

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_11.speaker: Slarmy
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_11.text: The state of this cart - what were they thinking?!
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_11.context: NodeContext: gesturing to his left, aghast as well as annoyed

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_9.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_9.text: They wasn't thinking - starving folk tend not to.

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_8.speaker: Slarmy
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_8.text: If they'd just lined up and - and taken their fair shares, we'd have plenty for everyone!

AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_3.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
AD_HalflingTrioDespairs_3.text: 'If' won't get us fed and watered.
